description:
[b]Fork of the original "Enable Survival Player" by Vajdani[/b]

[b]Original resources:[/b]
[list]
[*] [url=https://github.com/Vajdani/SM-Enable-Survival-Player]GitHub Repository[/url]
[*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3216708262]Original Steam Workshop[/url]
[/list]

[i]The original mod is no longer maintained. This fork is updated and maintained by a developer from the Scrap Wars team.[/i]

[h2]License[/h2]
This project is licensed under the MIT License.
[b]Copyright notices:[/b]
[list]
[*] Original work: Copyright (c) 2025 Vajdani
[*] Modifications: Copyright (c) 2025 Hoyvv ([url=https://discord.gg/zZ3zDyEMc2]Scrap Wars team[/url])
[/list]

[hr][/hr]

[h1]This mod enables survival functionality in creative mode.[/h1]
[i]Tested in multiplayer - use at your own risk in custom game modes.[/i]

The mod offers several chat commands to customize your experience.

[h3]Host only commands[/h3]
[list]
[*] [b]/pvp[/b] — Enables player vs player mode, players can hurt each other.
[*] [b]/healthregeneration[/b] — Toggles health regeneration.
[*] [b]/hunger[/b] — Toggles hunger.
[*] [b]/thirst[/b] — Toggles thirst.
[*] [b]/overridedisplaynames[/b] — Sets the display mode of player names (1-all / 2-team / 3-none / 4-no override).
[*] [b]/breathloss[/b] — Toggles breath loss underwater.
[*] [b]/respawnstats[/b] — Sets start HP, thirst, and hunger.
[*] [b]/clearallinventories[/b] — Clears all items from all players' inventories.
[*] [b]/creativeinventory[/b] — Toggles the creative inventory.
[*] [b]/collisiontumble[/b] — Toggles whether you can tumble from collisions.
[*] [b]/collisiondamage[/b] — Toggles whether you can take damage from collisions.
[*] [b]/godmode[/b] — Toggles god mode.
[*] [b]/savepreset[/b] — Saves the current settings by name.
[*] [b]/loadpreset[/b] — Loads settings by the preset name.
[*] [b]/dropitems[/b] — Whether players drop death bags after dying.
[*] [b]/ammoconsumption[/b] — Toggles whether weapons consume ammunition.
[*] [b]/createteam[/b] — Creates a team with a name and color (optional).
[*] [b]/deleteteam[/b] — Deletes a team.
[*] [b]/friendlyfire[/b] — Toggles friendly fire.
[*] [b]/setrespawncooldown[/b] — Sets the respawn cooldown.
[*] [b]/unseatondamage[/b] — Sets whether the player gets unseated upon receiving damage.
[*] [b]/setteamspawnpoint[/b] — Sets a specific spawn point for a team.
[*] [b]/clearteamspawnpoint[/b] — Clears the spawn point for a team.
[/list]

[h3]Commands usable by everyone[/h3]
[list]
[*] [b]/setspawnpoint[/b] — Sets your personal spawn point (takes priority over beds).
[*] [b]/clearspawnpoint[/b] — Clears your personal spawn point.
[*] [b]/setteam[/b] — Sets your team.
[*] [b]/clearteam[/b] — Clears your team.
[*] [b]/listteams[/b] — Lists all current teams in the chat.
[*] [b]/suicide[/b] — Instantly kills your character to allow respawning.
[/list]
name: Enable Survival Player Updated
